experience: You and Dustin both know Claudia Reilly, Erika Flora PMP, PgMP, ITIL Expert,PRINCE2,CSP, and 115 others
I'm disappointed at recent posts by "influencers" bragging about firing employees - especially new ones - as if it is a badge of honor, a symbol of their great decisiveness.

One bragged about firing someone after one day. Another about firing his best designer because she failed him in a client meeting -- even though he admittedly gave literally zero guidance and support to the designer.
You sourced them. You interviewed them. You deemed them a great fit and hired them. You onboarded them. You set their course. You were accountable to provide support and guidance.
But now it is all their fault that it didn't work out?
We are supposed to believe that the same insufficient discernment you used to choose them can be trusted to evaluate their future in just 8 hours of employment?
Or that firing your most talented employee, after giving them zero support, shows great leadership?
Sure, we all make bad hires. We all have employees which don't work out.

But the firing - except for ethical and behavioral issues - should never be thought of as anything other than a regrettable scenario which demands compassion for the employee and learning and growth by the employer.
Not fodder for likes on LinkedIn.

Supported: Utah, Washington, & VirginiaVerisys is the leading provider of the most accurate and comprehensive data and responsive technology tools to inform health care organizations on building and sustaining a fully screened, monitored and compliant workforce. Since 1992, Verisys has been leading the health care industry by providing the highest quality data coupled with deep health care industry experience. We help organizations understand the complexities of sanctions, including disciplinary actions and the implications of licensing requirements in order to maximize their results to hire safe team members, mitigate risk of reputational damage, financial loss, legal entanglement or regulatory noncompliance. Verisys solutions ensure regulatory compliance and prevent healthcare waste, abuse and fraud. Verisys’ products and services include provider data and content, credentialing, primary source verification services, screening monitoring and notification services, identity/authentication tied to credentials management and regulatory compliance products and services.

Supported: Utah, & CaliforniaSince 1920, C.R. England has been safely and effectively moving temperature-sensitive freight including dairy products, meats, fresh produce, beverages, and various chemicals. For more than 90 years, we have fulfilled our commitment to customers by combining top-of-the-line equipment with dedicated drivers and logistics staff. Each of our refrigerated trailers is equipped with temperature controlled reefer units to ensure constant temperature from start to finish. We offer long haul National truckload service, short and medium haul Regional service, service to and from Mexico, expedited priority rail service, and Dedicated service customized to meet the needs of individual customers. As always, our on-time service is competitively priced at every level.

recommendations: Blake Wettstein, DM
Global Labor Architect | Senior Manager Talent Acquisition Programs
February 28, 2017, Dustin worked with Blake in the same group

Dustin doesn't post and hope there will be applicants. The real success in talent acquisition is harvesting from your own curated and carefully nurtured passive talent pool. It takes time but reaps amazing rewards.  Dustin networks constantly to add to the passive talent pool.  He  connects on the same level as the candidate.  Candidates trust him.    This is how you build, nurture, and hire great talent.

Director Talent Management and Organizational Development
May 4, 2017, Dustin worked with Erik in different groups

Erik is a leader among leaders. Calming in his approach, yet balanced with a sense of urgency. In stressful circumstances Erik has an uncanny ability to maintain a positive attitude and motivate those around him to stay on task. He has the best interpersonal skills that I have come across in a long time. He is very professional and structured, yet makes anyone feel comfortable and open to him. Detail-oriented, effective, and passionate about his work. His innovative energy, attention to detail, and customer focused attitude insure requirements are tailored appropriately for each of his customers. If I were building a "dream team" for my most important business venture, Erik would most certainly be a part of it. On top of all of this, he’s a hell of a fisher-man. In short: Employers love him, Employees follow him, & Fish fear him.

January 28, 2016, Dustin worked with Dominick in different groups

Dominick is a rising star! Hyper intelligent and has a leadership presence about him that escalates him far beyond his experience, into another stratum. I was privileged to see first-hand as he took an overwhelming task, and led with extraordinary polish, business acumen, and organizational skills. All of this while maintaining the balance between the needs of a multi-billion dollar corporation, and the quick turnaround / R.O.I. of a start-up. Some people are developed into leadership; others just have it from the beginning. Based on my experience with Dominick, he has had it from the beginning. I would welcome the opportunity to work with Dominick again.

summary: Dedicated Human Resources Management, and Talent Acquisition, professional with more than two decades of experience in connecting the best people with the best organizations. I specialize in HR consulting, staff augmentation consulting, vendor management, change management, workforce planning, and Talent Acquisition, TA Operations, & Talent Management. Meeting the needs for the world's top organizations for positions across the US. Strengths include: Coaching and developing Recruiting team in Talent Acquisition efficiencies and best practices	Salary negotiations, and early closing of potential candidates Operations Management of multiple employees, and sitesRelationship development, retention, and consultative communicationCoaching in change management, and effective implementation of policy changes Development and implementation of creative recruiting strategies in tight candidate driven markets Identifying specific market challenges, in order to customize recruiting strategies specific to each geographic location  Creative recruiting techniques with extremely hard to find/fill skill sets across all enterprise verticalsscreening, interviewing, hiring, and management of highly technical and specialized niche employeesI love what I do! I love helping people! I discovered long ago that, the most impactful way to improve a person's life is through good employment, and helping people in this is my life calling. Please do not hesitate to let me know how I can help you.
